abstractText: A Nepalese concertina manuscript containing Buddhist tantric stotras and invocations, mainly to Mañjuśrī and other bodhisattvas and deities.
abstractShort: A Nepalese concertina manuscript containing Buddhist tantric stotras and invocations, mainly to Mañjuśrī and other bodhisattvas
title: Buddhist tantric stotras and invocations
